---
title: "tidyYarns Exploratory Data Analysis"
---
#Load library and data dependencies
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
source("tidyYarns.R")
tidy_yarns <- tidyYarns()
```


# Total number of yarns
```{r}
length(unique(tidy_yarns$yarn))
```

# Yarn type distribution
```{r}
ggplot(data = tidy_yarns) +
        geom_bar(mapping = aes(type))
```

# Unique Dyed Yarns
```{r}
unique(tidy_yarns[which(tidy_yarns$type == "Dye"),])

```



# Unique Purchased Yarns
```{r}
unique(tidy_yarns[which(tidy_yarns$type == "Pur"),])
```

# Unique Spun Yarns

```{r}
unique(tidy_yarns[which(tidy_yarns$type == "Spun"),])
```

# Unique Twist Yarns

```{r}
unique(tidy_yarns[which(tidy_yarns$type == "Twist"),])
```
